topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a85f8e6368725b24000400#post_55a85f8e6368725b24000400
It's basically about two sisters participating in an experiment to unlock psionic powers and to make supersoldiers. One escapes, The other finds her and ends up murdering her. Her mind survives though and takes over Diana's cyborg body, Turning into a creature called Genocyber that proceeds to murder everything.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a860e9636872180e00029f#post_55a860e9636872180e00029f
I already made my views clear Swat Cats is just a second tier talking animal show with the colors darkened and needless lack of bailing out animations, it's no better quality wise then Mighty Ducks with the exception that MD had good voice acting and a more likable set of heroes, since their are better versions i don't see how it's value exceeds a show that at least did new and interesting things,
